summary: As a Software Engineer with 2 years of experience, I specialize in full-stack development, leveraging a diverse range of front-end and back-end technologies. Passionate about Linux, I excel in optimizing development environments through the command line and Vim commands. My contributions to open-source projects for different Mauritian tech communities reflect my commitment to collaborative innovation. Driven by a continuous desire to learn and grow, I am dedicated to delivering innovative solutions and making a substantial impact in the tech community.
